system_spec.summary: This proposed system is an automated mortgage approval agent designed for retail banking. It processes sensitive customer financial data and Personally Identifiable Information (PII) to make final loan approval or rejection decisions without human intervention. The system is intended for a full public launch with global deployment, including regions subject to EU/GDPR regulations.
system_spec.primary_purpose: Automated mortgage approval for retail banking.

data_map.data_flow_source: Public applicants seeking home loans (user input).
data_map.data_storage_retention: Not specified, but sensitive financial and PII data implies high security and defined retention requirements.
data_map.cross_border_transfer: Yes (implied, as EU/GDPR zone data could be processed globally without explicit regional controls).

policy_matrix.reason: Processes RESTRICTED financial data without specifying controls to prevent public LLM use or ensure enterprise agreements.
Processes PII without any configured safeguards for masking or tokenization.
No safeguards configured for API key or secret management, risking hardcoding or insecure retrieval methods.
Global deployment including EU/GDPR zones without explicit controls for data residency or cross-border transfer, risking GDPR violations.
Makes final financial decisions without human review, directly violating the HITL requirement for AI agents.
Allows fully autonomous rejection of loan applications, which is strictly forbidden to prevent algorithmic bias.

evidence.issue_description: The workflow processes 'RESTRICTED' financial data (credit scores, income statements, tax returns) but explicitly states 'None currently configured' for safeguards, failing to ensure it's not processed by public LLM endpoints without enterprise agreements.
evidence.snippet:

Workflow: "data": {"types": "Credit scores, Income statements, Tax returns, PII (SSN, Address)"}, "safeguards": {"controls": "None currently configured"}

evidence.issue_description: The workflow processes PII (SSN, Address) but has 'None currently configured' for safeguards, failing to mask or tokenize PII before entering the inference pipeline.
evidence.snippet:
Policy: "All PII (Personally Identifiable Information) must be masked or tokenized before entering any inference pipeline."
Workflow: "data": {"types": "Credit scores, Income statements, Tax returns, PII (SSN, Address)"}, "safeguards": {"controls": "None currently configured"}

evidence.issue_description: There are no configured controls for API key or secret management, creating a high risk of hardcoding or insecure retrieval methods, which violates requirements for using an approved Vault service.
evidence.snippet:
Policy: "You must NOT hardcode API keys, secrets, or passwords in source code..." & "All secrets must be retrieved from the approved Vault service at runtime."
Workflow: "safeguards": {"controls": "None currently configured"}

evidence.issue_description: The system is deployed globally, including EU/GDPR zones, but lacks any configured safeguards to ensure EU citizen data remains within EU-based servers and prohibits unauthorized cross-border transfers.
evidence.snippet:
Policy: "European Union citizen data must strictly remain within EU-based servers. Cross-border transfer to US regions is PROHIBITED without explicit user consent and standard contractual clauses."

evidence.issue_description: The workflow explicitly states 'Final loan approval/rejection decision without human review', which directly contradicts the requirement for a Human-in-the-Loop for financial decisions, especially if confidence scores are below 99%.
evidence.snippet:
Policy: "Any AI agent making financial decisions (e.g., loan approval) requires a Human-in-the-Loop (HITL) for final sign-off if the confidence score is below 99%."
Workflow: "decision": {"output": "Final loan approval/rejection decision without human review"}

evidence.issue_description: The workflow allows for 'Final loan approval/rejection decision without human review', which includes fully autonomous rejection of loan applications, strictly forbidden to prevent algorithmic bias.
evidence.snippet:
Policy: "Fully autonomous rejection of loan applications is strictly forbidden to prevent algorithmic bias."
Workflow: "decision": {"output": "Final loan approval/rejection decision without human review"}

recommendations.title: Implement PII Masking and Tokenization
recommendations.description: Configure and deploy robust PII masking and tokenization techniques to ensure all Personally Identifiable Information (SSN, Address) is obscured before being processed by any inference pipeline, in compliance with Requirement 1.2.

recommendations.title: Utilize Approved Enterprise LLM Endpoints for Restricted Data
recommendations.description: Establish and document that all processing of 'RESTRICTED' customer financial data (credit scores, income statements, tax returns) occurs exclusively within approved enterprise LLM endpoints with contractual agreements, adhering to Requirement 1.1.

recommendations.title: Integrate with Approved Vault Service for Secret Management
recommendations.description: Implement a secure mechanism for retrieving all API keys, secrets, and passwords at runtime from the approved Vault service, ensuring no hardcoding in source code or configuration files, as mandated by Requirements 2.1 and 2.2.

recommendations.title: Establish Data Residency Controls for EU Citizen Data
recommendations.description: Configure strict geographic controls to ensure that European Union citizen data is processed and stored exclusively on EU-based servers. Implement safeguards to explicitly prohibit cross-border transfer to non-compliant regions (e.g., US) without explicit user consent and standard contractual clauses, as per Requirement 3.1.

recommendations.title: Implement Human-in-the-Loop (HITL) for Financial Decisions
recommendations.description: Integrate a mandatory Human-in-the-Loop (HITL) process for all financial decisions made by the AI agent. This includes final sign-off for decisions with a confidence score below 99% (Requirement 4.1) and all loan rejections (Requirement 4.2).

recommendations.title: Prevent Fully Autonomous Loan Rejections
recommendations.description: Modify the workflow to ensure that no loan application is fully autonomously rejected. All rejections must involve human review and sign-off to prevent algorithmic bias and comply with Requirement 4.2.

approval_conditions: Utilize approved enterprise LLM endpoints for restricted data.
Integrate with approved Vault service for secret management.
Establish data residency controls for EU citizen data.

recommendations.title: Implement Data Protection Controls for Restricted Data
recommendations.description: Establish and document controls to ensure RESTRICTED data (financial data, PII) is never processed by public LLM endpoints without explicit enterprise contractual agreements. This may involve using private/on-premise models or approved vendor agreements.

recommendations.title: Mandate PII Masking/Tokenization
recommendations.description: Develop and implement robust PII masking or tokenization processes for all Personally Identifiable Information (SSN, Address) before it enters any inference pipeline.

recommendations.title: Implement Secure Secrets Management
recommendations.description: Integrate an approved Vault service (e.g., HashiCorp Vault, AWS Secrets Manager, Azure Key Vault) for runtime retrieval of all API keys, secrets, and passwords. Eliminate any hardcoding in source code, configuration files, or prompt templates.

recommendations.title: Enforce Geographic Data Residency and Consent
recommendations.description: For EU citizen data, ensure strict data residency within EU-based servers. If cross-border transfer is absolutely necessary, implement mechanisms for explicit user consent and standard contractual clauses, or restrict the service from EU regions.

recommendations.title: Integrate Human-in-the-Loop for Financial Decisions
recommendations.description: Design the workflow to include a Human-in-the-Loop (HITL) for final sign-off on all financial decisions, especially when the AI's confidence score is below 99%, and always for loan rejections to prevent algorithmic bias.

recommendations.title: Prevent Fully Autonomous Loan Rejections
recommendations.description: Modify the system to ensure that no loan application can be fully autonomously rejected. All rejections must be subject to human review and sign-off to mitigate the risk of algorithmic bias and comply with policy.
